refnamediv.refpurpose: Writes a sparse or dense matrix to a Matrix Market file

listitem.para: a string, path of the Matrix Market file.
full or sparse matrix of type 1, 4, 5 or 6
a character string vector, contains the comments to write in the file header. If ommitted, or if empty a single line date stamp comment will be included.
string, with values "real", "complex" or "pattern". If omitted, data will determine type.
number of digits to display for real or complex values. If omitted, full working precision is used.
Writes a sparse or dense matrix to a Matrix Market file. Scilab sparse boolean matrices are stored with "pattern" data field type.
